::Dark Prime::

    He would have smiled if he had a mouth. The Peace Embas=
sy had fallen for it. He travelled the distance to the peace buildings, but=
 then remembered something from his previos life as Primal Prime, the Embas=
sy was moving to a mountain. He scanned the mountains nearby (I figure they=
're not to far away) for any signs of Transformers. He picks up some in the=
 area around him. (Could be anyone)
    He walked towards the only signal i=
n a mountain, standing at the foot he decided on a course of action. He nee=
ded the leader to call upon CyberShark and Battera so he could finish his b=
usiness with them, simply killing them, and then the leader, thus crippling=
 the Peace efforts.
